author: Angus Gray
comment: Instead of freezing the planets on ambient, please make them act as hour/minute hands.
title: Great watchface!

author: Noel Kingwell
comment: Had an issue with this Devs Pixel Watchface where it would not sync to Android wear. Be patient!! After a half hour this watchface and the other showed and they are both pretty great.

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Noel :) Thank you for your comment, and your patience.
This is probably an Android Wear issue.
Anthony

title: Awesome!

author: Vladimir Amiorkov
comment: Awesome, please add Jupiter  Edit: Thanks you are awesome, best AW watch face

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content:
Hi Vladimir, 
Thanks for your comment. 
Jupiter will come in the next release, please be patient :) 
Anthony

author: David Taroyan
comment: This developers watch faces are simple yet beautiful. Very clean and well done. I've paid for many watch faces that aren't as good as this and these are free! Great job!

reply.author: Anthony Stéphan
reply.content: Hi David, thanks a lot for your (very) positive feedback, that's a pleasure to make quality apps for Android Wear users :)

title: Beautiful
